snippet.title: PlayStation®4 「Miracle Snack Shop」 Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#MiracleSnackShop #PS4 #PS5

After facing some major adversity, Seolhwa Cha ends up owning a small snack shop. 
There is just one problem: business is dead.

Seolhwa doesn't have time to sing the blues though because in his attic something has appeared... A portal?
Out from that portal walks... a queen from another world?!

As Seolhwa serves the first bowl of shaved ice to Philia, 
also known as Queen Salt...
He takes his first step toward growing closer to her......

What are you waiting for, Ice Sculptor? The queen wishes for shaved ice.

A frozen treat of a story that will make your heart pound, 
and it all begins in your snack shop!

PlayStation®4 「Miracle Snack Shop」 released on January 26th as PS Store!

Philia: voiced by Marie Miyake (JP) / Hyewon Jeong (KR)
Mira: voiced by Mai Ishihara (JP) / Mi Jang (KR)

©2023 Talesshop.・Joara.com All Rights Reserved. Published by CFK.
